title: Ticket #3010: Jobs exit with status zero, but no discernable success
description:
This is from a discussion on condor-fw/condor-devel, wherein jobs in LMCG are running, then exiting with status 0, but no output from the job.

Problem seems to happen with the windows machines in CAE.

Thread is at Condor-devel discussion and Condor-fw discussion
remarks:
2013-Feb-11 09:16:17 by nwp:
Abandoned, as I found cases where garbage input produces a exit status of 0.
creator: nwp
